attributes.action: Remove the promotion of disease from cigarette packets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sceintific discoveries are now uncovering a link between psyche and disease. As this link becomes more apparent the government policy of using cigarette packets to advertise and promote disease will be recognised as misguided.

rejection.details: The Government does not "advertise and promote" disease.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
